snippet.title: South of Midnight | Stop Motion Trailer
snippet.description:
In collaboration with Clyde Henry Productions and music reimagined by Kid Koala, we’re excited to present an original South of Midnight stop-motion piece created with real puppets and handcrafted maquettes using traditional stop-motion animation techniques.

Join us on Tuesday, February 11th, 2025, across Compulsion Games social channels as our global preview embargo lifts. Press and creators from around the world will share their first impressions and previews of South of Midnight!

South of Midnight is coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Steam and Windows PC on April 8th, 2025. Pre-order now!
Xbox: https://bit.ly/43RdS3Y
Steam: https://bit.ly/3CpKUMW
